creative: Draw a picture of your favorite animal
Make a card for someone in the family
learning: Learn some words in a new language
helpful: Sort your toys and donate ones you don't use

outdoor: Play tag or hide and seek outside
Look for interesting bugs or birds
Go for a walk and count how many dogs you see
family: Cook or bake something as a family
Have a movie night with popcorn
Tell stories about when you were younger
Look at old photo albums together
Have a picnic in the backyard
rainy_day: Build a blanket fort and read inside it
Have a stuffed animal tea party
Listen to music and have a dance party
conversation_starters: If you could have any superpower, what would it be and why?
What's the best thing that happened to you today?
If you could visit anywhere in the world, where would you go?
What's your favorite thing about our family?
If you could have any animal as a pet, what would you choose?
What do you want to be when you grow up?
What's something new you learned recently?
If you could eat only one food forever, what would it be?
What's your favorite memory from this year?
If you could meet any fictional character, who would it be?
What makes you feel happy?
What's something you're really good at?
If you could invent anything, what would you invent?
What's your favorite thing to do with friends?
What would you do if you were invisible for a day?
What's the funniest thing that ever happened to you?
If you could time travel, would you go to the past or future?
What's your favorite book or movie and why?
If you had a million dollars, what would you do with it?
What's something kind someone did for you recently?
